ProgramBlock.Name: DHT-11 Sensor
ProgramBlock.Description: Read temperature and humidity from a DHT-11 connected to GPIO.

ProgramBlock.Name: DHT-22 Sensor
ProgramBlock.Description: Read temperature and humidity from a DHT-22 connected to GPIO.

ProgramBlock.Name: GPIO Pin v.1
ProgramBlock.Description: Configurable GPIO pin as binary input sensor or output switch. (RaspberrySharp.IO)

ProgramBlock.Name: Grove - Chainable RGB Led
ProgramBlock.Description: Chainable RGB color led modules wired to GPIO#4 and GPIO#21/27 (power with 3v3). https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/Grove-Chainable_RGB_LED/
